doc.previous: The new Greater Cleveland Aquarium is on the west bank of the Cuyahoga River near Downtown 131
doc.after: Cleveland s major professional sports teams include the Cleveland Indians Major League Baseball Cleveland Browns National Football League and Cleveland Cavaliers National Basketball Association Local sporting facilities include Progressive Field FirstEnergy Stadium Quicken Loans Arena and the Wolstein Center
